item.description:
Frances Haugen, a Google Universal Search Product Manager will discuss Universal Search - how it changes the game, what the future holds, and how companies can adjust

Google is sponsoring the event. They are providing demonstration stations to give you an opportunity to talk with Google reps before and after the presentation.

Agenda:

6:30 PM Registration & Demo Stations Open
7:00 PM Frances Haugen's presentation
8:00 PM Networking & Demo Stations Open
item.name: SEMPO Boston Hosts Google Universal Search Event
